About Me

Let me tell you a few things

Professional Summary

I am passionate about web development, web frameworks, user experience solutions and visual design. A conscientious, fast learner, hard worker and reliable offering the ability to assess an organization’s needs and create great, simple, clean, robust web presence. Also I am able to work effectively both individually and within a team environment on multi-task while maintaining careful attention to details. Proficient with an array of programming and scripting languages and multimedia web tools.

Core Skills

  • HTML, CSS, JavaScript and JQuery
  • Bootstrap and Sass
  • PHP and MySQL
  • WordPress, Joomla and Prestashop
  • Adobe Photoshop and Figma
  • AWS and GitHub

Working on WordPress/Divi theme-based community charity website. Done research about different, similar kind of websites and created wireframe using Figma. Created custom header and footer, newsletter subscription using mailchimp, membership and contact form etc.
